events.message: I recently received my order but I want to request a refund because the item does not meet my expectations.
The customer's request has been classified under the refund cluster based on mention of refund and dissatisfaction.
A customer service agent was assigned to handle the refund request for the order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To begin processing your refund, I need the order number and a brief explanation of why you wish to return the product.
My order number is 123456789. The product arrived late and the color was completely different from what was shown on the website.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We can process a full refund for you or send a replacement item with correct specifications. Which option would you prefer?
I would like a full refund please. Since my experience was disappointing I donâ€™t want a replacement.
Your refund has been processed and should appear in your account within 5-7 business days. Thank you for your patience.
We wanted to check if your refund has been received and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing your refund case. Thank you for contacting support.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
